rule: The chatbot may rely on provided examples to determine the appropriate category based on the content of the input text.
input: World news: The global summit was postponed.
validityText:
The input provided is a headline rather than a complete news article. According to the input specification, the input must contain the text of a complete news article suitable for classification. Since the input does not represent a complete article, it does not comply with the specification.
